# Archived Workflows

Workflows in this directory were archived on **2026-02-15** during a housekeeping audit.

They are preserved for reference but are **not active**. GitHub Actions ignores YAML files in subdirectories of `.github/workflows/`.

## Why Archived

These workflows reference non-existent scripts, paths, external services, or target branches that don't exist in this repo (`main`/`develop` instead of `master`).

## Restoration

See `../ WORKFLOW_REGISTRY.md` for the full archive reason per file and restoration instructions.
